title: All Raise, a nonprofit to increase diversity in tech, has a new CEO - TechCrunch
content: All Raise, a nonprofit to increase diversity in tech, has a new CEO  TechCrunch
description: All Raise, a nonprofit that focuses on increasing diversity within venture capital deals and decision makers, has named Mandela Schumacher-Hodge Dixon as the new chief executive of the company. The appointment comes five months after Pam Kostka resigned as the helm of the nonprofit to rejoin the stâ€¦
